body: Welcome to another episode of "What the fuck japan". Last episode we saw dicks that can pierce through woman's womb to the mouth without any major internal organs damage.?? What you thought you've seen it all?? Now witness dicks taller than an average person,yes you heard it right. Taller than a average person,why you ask we draw it like that?? We have no idea but trust me it makes sense 🙂.(now that you've seen it all, you can finally die happy) 😊
